title: If you know...
body:
That someone is actively trolling games in ranked and/or normal, and they have been reported but you can see from their match history that it's an on going thing that continues to happen.

What is the best course of action? I put this player on ignore, but that doesn't prevent me from being matched w/ them again.

It's beyond frustrating, They go into games with out masteries, say they don't need them and then proceed to go lane to lane feeding the enemy team.

If it was a normal game I wouldn't care all that much because I don't expect anything but trolls/afks and people trying diff set ups/champs yada yada.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Qh9pyVXe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-11T22:47:09.927+0000)
>
> Submit a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Yeah that'll bring his LP back.
Riot only bans for racists comments or rage attitude. You can seriously go in and feed most matches without ever getting punished.
So trolls create rage which leads to people being tilted/toxic and trolls get away with it? kk got it....

This guy is lying.
Heavily influenced by the vocal minority, or toxic people, most likely.

idk I generally just report and move on, but looking at the match history and seeing the person in game legit run into a lane and just die while refusing to use any masteries... it was just ridiculous, but I did as Riot Tantram said and submitted a ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Candyxo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Qh9pyVXe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-11T22:38:58.179+0000)
>
> So trolls create rage which leads to people being tilted/toxic and trolls get away with it? kk got it....

What Photos of Ghosts said. They do bans in waves, so that people can't figure out exactly how they detect those type of behaviors. Unfortunately that means there's also a delay, until the next wave goes out.
No they don't. The system is just too lenient - not sensitive enough, but it exists. There have been numerous waves of troll bans and now they're doing it systematically.
What a troll. Got nothing better to do than to spam pings constantly without being there.

> [{quoted}](name=Grashnim,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Qh9pyVXe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-11T22:01:49.280+0000)
>
> Riot only bans for racists comments or rage attitude. You can seriously go in and feed most matches without ever getting punished.

Pretty much this.

Riot doesn't give a lick about what people do in game as long as its not in chat.

So the answer is to use a ticket to report the person then.  That seems to be what is said.  

Most people btw understand a troll vs a "bad game".  0-10 at 8 min mark with no masteries is not a bad game.  Going duo mid because you didn't get it when you queued in lane is "not a bad game".  1 cs mid Sona 0-8 at 10 min is not a bad game.  All these things happen, people laugh when you ask your team to report them "nothing will happen to me".  Team may or may not report, we don't know because don't see it.  

There is NO FEAR OF BEING BANNED to the trolls so they continue is the point.  But if submitting tickets is the way to go then so be it.

The issue with "trolling" in the context given, is there is no proof the person didn't have a bad game. Or in fact, a handful of bad games. I mean, if you're talking 0-20-0, that's one thing. But 1-8-3, won't send up red flags, though it will give you rage.

As I said, even though it always gets the down vote rage, the automated system only seems to bad for racist/rage remarks. Sorry boys and girls, without the tribunal, bans now suck.

So you mean to say that someone that isn't using masteries and asking them why and they say "i don't need that shit" then go to each lane to just die over and over, is not trolling, it wasn't just a bad game or just a handful of bad games, his whole match history for the last 20 games that op.gg shows was nothing but the same thing.
